name: 淫従の堕天使 〜Requiem for Fallen Angels〜
summary: Hero lives with a lovely younger sister and suppresses affection for her. However, his friend knows of such feelings and invites hero to attack surrounding women. But hero has a subtle feeling that his sister is going to be involved as well sooner or later...
info:
• 平台: MS-DOS
  • 平台: PC98
  • 平台: WIN
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 发行日期: 1996-12-13
  • シナリオ: 竹肉内丸
  • 原画: 刳形 寿庵
  • キャラクターデザイン: 刳形 寿庵
  • 音楽: 磯田 重晴
